backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining products, inventory, sales, expenses, cash transactions, user profiles, and access‑controlled CRUD operations with authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend React components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining CSS variables for light and dark themes using custom OKLCH color values.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app shell handling navigation between pages, wrapping content in a QueryClientProvider, and rendering a footer.
frontend/src/components/AdjustStockModal: Modal component for increasing or reducing inventory stock with validation, normalized error messages, and backend mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard showing sales summary, revenue, payment method totals, and low stock alerts with authentication and loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/EditInventoryIte: Provides a modal form for editing an inventory item with validation, duplicate-name checks, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/EditSaleModal.ts: Displays a modal to edit a sale’s payment method and items, including validation, item adjustments, and updating totals.
frontend/src/components/ExpenseReportPag: Shows a report of expenses with authentication checks, total calculation, table display, and loading/error handling.
frontend/src/components/ExpensesPage.tsx: Offers a form for adding new expense records with validation, auto-calculated totals, and submission via mutation.
frontend/src/components/InventoryFormMod: Modal form for creating inventory items with validation, error normalization, and automatic stock calculations.
frontend/src/components/InventoryPage.ts: Main inventory management page with item listing, creation, editing, stock adjustments, and authentication handling.
frontend/src/components/InventoryReportP: Displays inventory change history with filtering options, authentication checks, and error/loading states.
frontend/src/components/LowStockBanner.t: Shows a warning banner listing inventory items that are below minimum stock levels.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Top navigation bar with menu items and dropdowns for switching between views.
frontend/src/components/ProductFormModal: Modal for adding new products with image upload, validation, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/ProductsPage.tsx: Displays the product catalog with loading, error, empty state, and authentication handling, and allows opening a modal to add products.
frontend/src/components/QuantityPromptMo: Modal for entering product quantity, showing price details and confirming item addition.
Shows normalized error messages with retry handling and special states for auth-related errors.
Displays sales reports with filtering, export, edit/delete actions, and authentication gating.
frontend/src/components/SignInRequiredSt: Reusable UI prompting the user to sign in via Internet Identity with a login button.
frontend/src/components/StockDeductionRu: Empty placeholder file for a future stock deduction rules modal.
Handles creating sales transactions with cart management, quantity prompts, checkout logic, and auth checks.
frontend/src/constants/productOptions.ts: Defines shared constants and types for product categories, sizes, and names.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on authentication state and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerRole.ts: Fetches the caller's backend role with a safe 'user' fallback and warns not to use it for UI gating.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardSummary.t: Loads dashboard summary data from the backend when the actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useExpenses.ts: Provides queries and mutations for fetching expense records and adding new expense entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity, login, logout, and status through a context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useInvalidateActorQue: Invalidates and refetches the actor query and all dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInventory.ts: Fetches inventory items and provides mutations to add, update, or adjust inventory stock with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInventoryReport.ts: Retrieves filtered inventory report entries based on text filter and time range.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Loads product list and provides a mutation for adding new products.
frontend/src/hooks/usePublicActor.ts: Creates and maintains an anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecordSale.ts: Submits a new sale and invalidates dashboard and inventory data afterward.
frontend/src/hooks/useSalesMutations.ts: Provides mutations for updating and deleting sales and invalidates sales and dashboard queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useSalesReport.ts: Fetches sales records within a given timestamp range.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global styles, theme variables, and light/dark mode palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/utils/errorMessage.ts: Normalizes backend error messages into user-friendly titles and messages, detecting auth, network, timeout, and connection issues.
frontend/src/utils/exportToXls.ts: Generates an HTML-based Excel file from sales line items and triggers a download with a timestamped filename.
frontend/src/utils/inventoryName.ts: Provides functions to normalize inventory item names and detect duplicates in a list, with optional ID exclusion.
frontend/src/utils/lowStock.ts: Determines whether inventory items are below minimum stock and filters lists to only low‑stock items.
frontend/src/utils/salesFormat.ts: Formats currency, timestamps, and payment method labels for sales display using Indonesian locale rules.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters across routing modes and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins including typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes project state, issues, and existing features related to authentication actors, error handling, and retry mechanisms.
